messages.content: What is the purpose of the Noisy Latent Image node in ComfyUI_Noise?
Generates noise which can be used to influence image generations.
How many settings does the Duplicate Batch Index node have?
What does the Slerp Latents node do?
Mixes two latents together, creating a weighted average of their values.
How can I calculate the amount of noise a sampler expects?
Use the Get Sigma node to calculate the sigma based on the model and sampler configuration.
Which node can inject noise into an image latent?
The Inject Noise node is used to inject the generated noise into the image latent.
What is the function of the Unsampler node?
Calculates the noise required to generate a given image from a model and a prompt.
Give an example of using the nodes to generate variations from a given seed.
The provided workflow demonstrates using nodes to generate small variations of an image based on a given seed.
How can I access the noise used to recreate a specific image?
The workflow provides an example of using the Unsampler node to generate the noise that recreates a given image.
